data.name: Some Some Convenience Store / Soohee After Story
data.detailed_description:
Find out what happens after Soohee Pyeon's ending

Before I knew it, it had been a year since I met Soohee.
As if fate were guiding our actions, we all ended up back at the convenience store.
The reason: the store, relationships, and Some Some...

This game features:

- A rich, fun story for all to enjoy (longer than Soohee Pyeon's original route)
- New features that will add new elements to convenience store life
- New costumes, backgrounds, and character art
- A vocal track performed by Soohee Pyeon (voiced by Chaeha Kim)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 3 or higher
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 32MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® XP or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or higher
  • Graphics: 64MB or greater graphics card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
